description: A name, code, or date describing an event or period in geologic time, expressed either as an absolute date calculated using a named dating method, or as a relative date that is drawn from stratigraphy or biostratigraphy.
title: geologicAge

___ageEstimate.description: Either an absolute geologic date or a relative geologic age name describing an event or period in geologic time based on the Geologic_Time_Scale.

___ageExplanation.description: The name and/or description of the method used to calculate the ageEstimate. Detailed information about the method may be provided through references contained in the ageReference.

___ageUncertainty.description: The error estimate for the geologic time. This should include the units of measure, a description of what the error estimate represents and how it was calculated.

___ageTimeScale.description: Name of a recognized geologic time scale. This includes "Absolute" as the name of the time scale for measuring geologic dates before the present and names of geologic dating systems that are arrangements of symbols or names in order of relative geologic time

___ageReference.description: Citation for works providing detailed information about any element of the geologicAge.

_88series.description: Information about the series, or aggregate resource, to which a resource belongs.
_88series.title: series

___responsibleParty.description: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organization(s) associated with the cited resource.

___alternateTitle.description: Alias by which the cited resource is known.

___otherCitationDetails.description: Other information required to complete the citation that is not recorded elsewhere.

ISO 19115-2: CI_Citation > citedResponsibleParty > CI_ResponsibleParty > contact > CI_Contact > onlineResource > CI_OnlineResource

___onlineResource.description: On-line information related to the citation.

___graphic.description: Online graphic associated with the citation

___presentationForm.description: The form that the resource is presented, such as: digital map, digital document, etc.

___title.description: Name by which the cited resource is known.

___identifier.description: Identifier for the resource in the context of the citation.

___date.description: Date referenced to the cited resource.
